data.subject: With A Song In My Heart
data.lyric:
Though I know that we meet ev'ry night
 and we couldn't have changed since the last time
 to my joy

data.subject: The Lady Is A Tramp
data.lyric:
I've wined and dined on Mulligan stew and never wished for turkey
 As I hitched and hiked and grifte

data.subject: Dancing On The Ceiling
data.lyric:
The world is lyrical
 Because a miracle
 Has brought my lover to me
 Though she's some other place,

data.subject: To Keep My Love Alive
data.lyric:
I've been married, and married, and often I've sighed
 I'm never a bridesmaid, I'm always a bride

data.subject: A Ship Without A Sail
data.lyric:
I don't know what day it is
 Or if it's dark or fair
 Somehow, that's just the way it is
 And I don'

data.subject: You Took Advantage Of Me
data.lyric:
I'm a sentimental sap, that's all
 What's the use of trying not to fall
 I have no will, you've made

data.subject: Have You Met Miss Jones?
data.lyric:
It happened
 I felt it happened
 I was awake
 I wasn't blind
 I didn't think
 I felt it happened
 no
